name: Mage V. Machina
description:
Mage V. Machina is about a little mage in a world invaded by living machines.

/***************** Gameplay *****************

Collect all the gems in each level to activate portals

Collect hearts to restore health

/**********************************************

/****************** Controls ******************

The Little Mage can both jump on enemies and shoot to destroy them.

Use WASD to move the Little Mage. Space to jump.

The Little Mage's wand can be controlled with the mouse and shot with left click.

/********************************************

/****************** Credits ******************

Game Design - Dean Stanton & Brian Pham

Programming - Dean Stanton & Brian Pham

Art - Brian Pham

Level Design - Dean Stanton

Title Song - Brian Pham

/********************************************
